rust-red.gloss: of a red color tinged with rust

rustic.gloss: characteristic of the fields or country

rusty.gloss: of the brown color of rust

rusty-red.gloss: of a red color tinged with rust

ruthful.gloss: feeling or expressing pain or sorrow for sins or offenses
